City of Riverside Proclamation of Local Emergency Regarding Novel Coronavirus COVID 19 March 13, 2020

meta.search-text: N CITY OF RIVERSIDE W STATE OF CALIFORNIA A PROCLAMATION OF LOCAL EMERGENCY REGARDING NOVEL CORONAVIRUS (COVID-19) WHEREAS, the California Emergency Services Act (Government Code section 8550, et seq.), a Government Code section 8630, and Riverside Municipal Code sections 2.68.010 and 9.20.060 empower the 7 Director of Emergency Services and the Riverside City Council to proclaim a Local Emergency when the City 8 Council is not in session when there exist conditions of disaster or of extreme peril to the safety of persons 9 and property within the territorial limits of the City of Riverside which are or are likely to be beyond the 10 control of the services, personnel, equipment, and facilities of the City and require the combined forces of 11 other political subdivisions to combat; and 12 WHEREAS, on March 8, 2020, the Riverside County's Public Health Officer declared a local 13 health emergency based on an imminent and proximate threat to public health from the introduction of a 14 Novel Coronavirus (COVID-19) in Riverside County; and 15 WHEREAS, on March 10, 2020, the County of Riverside proclaimed a local emergency; and 16 WHEREAS, the Governor of California proclaimed a State of Emergency on March 4, 2020, 17 pursuant to the authority vested in him, particularly, Government Code section 8625; and 18 WHEREAS, the Governor has waived the 60-day time period in Government Code section 8630, 19 within which a local governing authority must renew a local emergency, for the duration of the statewide 20 emergency, and further, has ordered that any such local emergency will remain in effect until each local 21 governing authority terminates its respective local emergency; and 22 WHEREAS, the Director of Emergency Services hereby finds: 23 (1) That at the time of this Proclamation the Riverside City Council is not in session; and 24 (2) That there exist conditions of a disaster or of extreme peril to the safety of persons and 25 property within the territorial limits of the City of Riverside that are beyond the control of the 26 services, personnel, equipment, and facilities of the City for the reasons of COVID-19 and as 27 set forth in the Public Health Officer's Declaration of a Local Health Emergency and County 28 Local Emergency; (3) That the aforementioned conditions are or are likely to be beyond the control of the services, N personnel, equipment, and facilities of the City of Riverside and require the combined forces of other political subdivisions to combat; and A (4) That the aforesaid conditions warrant and necessitate the Proclamation of a Local Emergency. NOW, THEREFORE, IT IS HEREBY PROCLAIMED that a Local Emergency exists throughout the City of Riverside, commencing on or about 12:00 _p.m of the 15 day of MARCH , and IT IS FURTHER PROCLAIMED AND ORDERED that during the existence of said Local Emergency, the powers, functions and duties of the Director of Emergency Services and the emergency organization of this City shall be those prescribed by state law, by charter, ordinances, resolutions, and 10 approved plans of the City of Riverside in order to mitigate the effects of said emergency; and 11 IT IS FURTHER PROCLAIMED AND ORDERED that all City officials and employees 12 cooperate and coordinate efforts with officials and employees of other political subdivisions and officials 13 and employees of the county, state and federal government in bringing the present condition of the Local 14 Emergency under control; and 15 IT IS FURTHER PROCLAIMED AND ORDERED that the Local Emergency shall be deemed to 16 continue to exist for the next seven (7) days, and thereafter by ratification of the City Council, until its 17 termination is proclaimed by the City Council of the City of Riverside; and 18 IT IS FURTHER RESOLVED AND ORDERED that a copy of this Proclamation be forwarded to 19 the Director of the California Governor's Office of Emergency Services/ 20 21 Dated : 3/13/20 22 Director of Emergency Services City of Riverside, California 23 24 25 26 27 28 2
